scripts.build:packages: npm run build --workspace=@tjfontaine/wasm-loader && npm run build --workspace=@tjfontaine/web-agent-core
scripts.build: npm run build:wasm && npm run build:frontend
scripts.dev:wasm: cargo watch -w runtime/src -s 'cargo component build --release --target wasm32-wasip2 --manifest-path runtime/Cargo.toml'
scripts.clean: cargo clean && cd frontend && rm -rf dist src/wasm/mcp-server
